title: invalid literal for int() with base 10: ''
body:
## Component Versions

Please at least fill in the release version and GUI or CLI version.

- **Video2X release version**: 4.8.1 windows full
- **Upscaler version**:
- **GUI version**: 2.8.1
- **CLI version**:

## Symptom

The symptom is just as same as the title.üòâ So... I think it would be better to type what I've done.
1. Select a mpg file
2. Change settings:
   1. Main
      1. driver: Waifu2X Caffe
      2. processes: 8 (btw, should I type it the cores of CPU?)
      3. Scale Ratio: 2.8
   2. Driver Settings - Waifu2X Caffe
      1. process: cudnn
      2. GPU: 1 ( got this info from Windows Task Manager )

### System vars:
- CUDA_PATH: C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v11.1
- CUDNN:        C:\Program Files\NVIDIA GPU Computing Toolkit\CUDA\v11.1\lib\x64\cudnn.lib

## Error Log or Screenshots

#### Output from "save" button in GUI
[32m[+] INFO: Loading files into processing queue[0m
[90m2021-02-19 20:03:01.681900 [+] INFO: Input path(s): D:\Â§ñÊé•Á¢üÂÇô‰ªΩ\ÊîùÂΩ±Ê©ü\Á¥†Êùê\1.mpg[0m
[90m2021-02-19 20:03:01.682897 [+] INFO: File MIME type: video/mpeg[0m
[32m[+] INFO: Loaded files into processing queue[0m
[90m2021-02-19 20:03:01.690872 [+] INFO: Input file: D:\Â§ñÊé•Á¢üÂÇô‰ªΩ\ÊîùÂΩ±Ê©ü\Á¥†Êùê\1.mpg[0m
[32m[+] INFO: Reading file information[0m
[90m2021-02-19 20:03:01.691899 [+] INFO: Executing: D:\Documents\temp\video2x-4.8.1-win32-full\dependencies\ffmpeg\bin\ffprobe -v quiet -print_format json -show_format -show_streams -i D:\Â§ñÊé•Á¢üÂÇô‰ªΩ\ÊîùÂΩ±Ê©ü\Á¥†Êùê\1.mpg[0m
[90m2021-02-19 20:03:03.668566 [+] INFO: Creating cache directory C:\Users\TimSu\AppData\Local\Temp\video2x[0m
[90m2021-02-19 20:03:03.669563 [+] INFO: Extracted frames are being saved to: C:\Users\TimSu\AppData\Local\Temp\video2x\tmp50uts2li[0m
[90m2021-02-19 20:03:03.670560 [+] INFO: Upscaled frames are being saved to: C:\Users\TimSu\AppData\Local\Temp\video2x\tmpovq71jv1[0m
[32m[+] INFO: Starting upscaling video/GIF[0m
[32m[+] INFO: Getting total number of frames in the file[0m
[90m2021-02-19 20:03:03.671559 [+] INFO: Executing: D:\Documents\temp\video2x-4.8.1-win32-full\dependencies\ffmpeg\bin\ffprobe -v quiet -count_frames -select_streams v:1 -show_entries stream=nb_read_frames -of default=nokey=1:noprint_wrappers=1 D:\Â§ñÊé•Á¢üÂÇô‰ªΩ\ÊîùÂΩ±Ê©ü\Á¥†Êùê\1.mpg[0m

Traceback (most recent call last):

ValueError: invalid literal for int() with base 10: ''
